file_insights.changes: Added two new SEO-related fields to BlogRequest model: target_keyword (Optional[str], max 100 chars) and include_seo_analysis (bool, default False). Updated example to demonstrate new fields.
file_insights.impact: Extends BlogRequest API to support primary keyword targeting and optional SEO analysis output

file_insights.changes: Added same two SEO fields (target_keyword and include_seo_analysis) to BlogPostRequest model. Updated JSON schema example to show both new fields in context.
file_insights.impact: Ensures consistency across blog API layers with unified SEO configuration options

patterns_discovered: Field validation pattern: Using Pydantic Field with constraints (max_length) for string parameters
Documentation pattern: Consistent use of description parameter for API field documentation
Default value pattern: Boolean flags default to False for opt-in functionality (include_seo_analysis)
Example pattern: JSON schema examples updated in tandem across multiple models to maintain consistency
Nullable pattern: Optional fields use None defaults to support backward compatibility
Keyword configuration pattern: Dual keyword approach - multiple keywords list (seo_keywords) plus single primary keyword (target_keyword)
gotchas_discovered: Field ordering: target_keyword inserted between seo_keywords and include_outline in models.py, creating implicit coupling between field positions
Naming inconsistency: seo_keywords (plural, list) vs target_keyword (singular) may cause confusion about expected inputs
Example maintenance: JSON schema examples must be manually updated in multiple locations - risk of drift between actual fields and documentation
Duplication: Same fields added to both BlogRequest and BlogPostRequest models - potential maintenance burden if future changes needed
discoveries.approach_outcome: SUCCESS - Cleanly extended both API models with SEO options using consistent Pydantic patterns. Added target_keyword for primary SEO focus and include_seo_analysis flag for conditional output. Updated examples across both files. Implementation maintains backward compatibility with optional fields and sensible defaults.
recommendations: Consider creating a shared SEOOptions dataclass to reduce duplication between BlogRequest and BlogPostRequest models
Document the semantic difference between seo_keywords (list) and target_keyword (primary) in field descriptions to prevent API misuse
Implement automated schema documentation generation to reduce manual example maintenance burden
Add validation to ensure target_keyword is present in seo_keywords list if both are provided
Consider adding seo_analysis_config field to allow parameterization of SEO analysis output format
